articles.title: Cricket’s Uganda Story – Brought by British, Seized by the Indigenous & Indians - The Quint
articles.description: Cricket was brought to Uganda by the British missionaries, but the current squad, who will play at the 2024 ICC T20 World Cup, comprises a diverse mix of indigenous, Indian & Pakistani players. This is the story of Uganda's team and players.
articles.content:
It took Ronak four years to transition from the local tournaments to the international matches, and since then, he has been a mainstay in Ugandas batting order, scoring 779 T20I runs in 38 matches.
… [+276 chars]
